H0.text: What name is given to someone who starts fires maliciously. Incendiarist

H1.text: What name is given to someone who starts fires maliciously. Pyromaniac

H2.text: What name is given to someone who starts fires maliciously. Firebug

H3.text: What name is given to someone who starts fires maliciously. Arson

A4.text: Firebug (US) and fire raiser (UK), but these also refer to arsonists.

A5.text: Pyromania is a psychiatric diagnosis, and it is specified in the DSM-5 that classified pyromaniacs do not set fires for financial advantages or for revenge.

A6.text: The dictionary definition of arson at Wiktionary
